A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan of almost 40 years I went into watching TLJ as I always do - excited\, giddy with anticipation\, and looking forward to seeing where the story goes. TLJ did not disappoint. Is it perfect? No\, of course not. For me\, though\, it did what I want Star Wars movies to do - entertained and enthralled. Well done Rian Johnson.
